name: ICDEV Knowledge
description: Learning knowledge base for the ICDEV platform. Detects patterns from failures and successes, generates recommendations via AWS Bedrock, and triggers automated self-healing.

skills.name: Ingest Knowledge
skills.description: Ingest patterns, lessons learned, and best practices into the knowledge base for future reference.

skills.name: Detect Patterns
skills.description: Analyze logs, metrics, and event data to detect recurring patterns (failures, successes, optimizations).

skills.name: Generate Recommendations
skills.description: Generate actionable recommendations based on detected patterns and historical knowledge using AWS Bedrock.

skills.name: Self-Heal
skills.description: Analyze failure data and automatically apply known remediations for auto-healable patterns.
